item.description:
The weather has to be better this Saturday so let's try to play at 9 a.m. All ability levels are welcome. This group is about tennis, exersize, socializing and staying hydrated.

The Single Event tennis group run by the most "genial" Eric will be having the following get togethers:

Tonight ~ Wednesday ~ September 3rd ~ 5:30 PM
Conard High School ~ West Hartford


and

This Sunday ~ September 7th ~ 10:00 AM
Glastonbury High School ~ Glastonbury
330 Hubbard Street ~ Glastonbury, CT ~ 06033

Any questions or comments about this Saturday's meetup? Call me at 860-559-7983. Thanks.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis - Saturday at Conard
